title: Terminal
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419174651/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Terminology](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419174651/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Terminology) : Terminal**

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419174651im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Typophile_Terminals_3993.gif)

The [stroke](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419174651/http:/typophile.com/wiki/stroke) of a [glyph](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419174651/http:/typophile.com/wiki/glyph) ends in a terminal.

Types of terminals include:

- [Lachrymal Terminal](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419174651/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Lachrymal%20Terminal)
- [Ball Terminal](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419174651/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Ball%20Terminal)
- [Pen-Formed](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419174651/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Calligraphy)
- [Finial](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419174651/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Finial)
author: glyphobet
